A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
In a trilogy built on nostalgia\, this movie draws in people due to the old characters\, but due to the poorly integrated "progressive" themes and the old characters acting nothing like themselves... this movie hardly deserves the Star Wars name nor association with Luke Skywalker.

If this wasn't bad enough\, characters like Finn get hardly as much development as they should and get cheated out of a hero's death\, which would've at the very least made the movie have an impactful ending.

The only thing to say about this movie is it looks good\, but... it's not that surprising considering the budget.
